settings.title: Settings
settings.language.switchEffect: Changes will take effect immediately across all windows
settings.recordings.title: Recordings
settings.recordings.description: Manage your recordings and perform actions.
settings.app.dockIcon.description: Show Cap in the dock even when there are no windows available to close.
settings.app.notifications.description: Show system notifications for events like copying to clipboard, saving files, and more. You may need to manually allow Cap access via your system's notification settings.
settings.recording.instantModeRes.descri: Choose the maximum resolution for Instant Mode recordings.
settings.recording.mainWindowBehaviour.d: The main window recording start behaviour
settings.recording.postDeletionBehaviour: Should Cap reopen after deleting an in progress recording?
settings.recording.deleteInstant: Delete instant mode recordings after upload
settings.recording.deleteInstant.descrip: After finishing an instant recording, should Cap will delete it from your device?
settings.recording.crashRecovery.descrip: Records in fragmented segments that can be recovered if the app crashes or your system loses power. May have slightly higher storage usage during recording.
settings.recording.maxFps.description: Maximum framerate for screen capture. Higher values may cause instability on some systems.
settings.recording.maxFps.warning: ⚠️ Higher framerates may cause frame drops or increased CPU usage on some systems.
settings.pro.autoOpenLinks.description: Whether Cap should automatically open instant recordings in your browser
settings.server.url.description: This setting should only be changed if you are self hosting your own instance of Cap Web.
settings.server.url.confirm: Are you sure you want to change the server URL to '{{origin}}'? You will need to sign in again.
settings.shortcuts.description: Configure system-wide keyboard shortcuts to control Cap
settings.screenshots.description: Manage your screenshots and perform actions.
settings.screenshots.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this screenshot?
settings.integrations.title: Integrations
settings.integrations.description: Configure integrations to extend Cap's functionality and connect with third-party services.
settings.integrations.s3.name: S3 Config
settings.integrations.s3.description: Connect your own S3 bucket for complete control over your data storage. All new shareable link uploads will be automatically uploaded to your configured S3 bucket, ensuring you maintain complete ownership and control over your content. Perfect for organizations requiring data sovereignty and custom storage policies.
settings.integrations.s3Config.testSucce: S3 configuration test successful! Connection is working.
settings.integrations.s3Config.testFaile: S3 connection test failed. Check your config and network connection.
settings.integrations.s3Config.testTimeo: Connection test timed out after 5 seconds. Please check your endpoint URL and network connection.
settings.integrations.s3Config.guidePref: It should take under 10 minutes to set up and connect your storage bucket to Cap. View the
settings.experimental.title: Experimental Features
settings.experimental.description: These features are still in development and may not work as expected.
settings.experimental.customCursorCaptur: Custom cursor capture in Studio Mode
Studio Mode recordings will capture cursor state separately for customisation (size, smoothing) in the editor. Currently experimental as cursor events may not be captured accurately.
settings.experimental.nativeCameraPrevie: Show the camera preview using a native GPU surface instead of rendering it within the webview. This is not functional on certain Windows systems so your mileage may vary.
settings.experimental.autoZoomOnClicks.d: Automatically generate zoom segments around mouse clicks during Studio Mode recordings. This helps highlight important interactions in your recordings.
settings.feedback.title: Send Feedback
settings.feedback.description: Help us improve Cap by submitting feedback or reporting bugs. We'll get right on it.
settings.feedback.placeholder: Tell us what you think about Cap...
settings.feedback.community.title: Join the Community
settings.feedback.community.description: Have questions, want to share ideas, or just hang out? Join the Cap Discord community.
settings.feedback.debug.title: Debug Information
settings.feedback.debug.description: Upload your logs to help us diagnose issues with Cap. No personal information is included.
settings.feedback.system.title: System Information
settings.license.pro.title: Cap Pro License
settings.license.pro.description: Your account is upgraded to Cap Pro and already includes a commercial license.
settings.license.commercial.title: Commercial License
settings.license.activate.title: Have a license key?
settings.license.purchase.features.comme: Commercial Use of Cap Recorder + Editor
settings.defaultProjectName.title: Default Project Name
settings.defaultProjectName.description: Choose the template to use as the default project and file name.
settings.defaultProjectName.placeholders: Use placeholders in your template that will be automatically filled in.
settings.defaultProjectName.examples.tar: The name of the monitor or the title of the app depending on the recording mode.
settings.defaultProjectName.customFormat: You can also use a custom format for time. The placeholders are case-sensitive. For 24-hour time, use
settings.excludedWindows.title: Excluded Windows
settings.excludedWindows.description: Choose which windows Cap hides from your recordings.
settings.excludedWindows.note: Only Cap related windows can be excluded on Windows due to technical limitations.
